last_episode_to_air.name: Letting Go
last_episode_to_air.overview: Doug is upset when Buddy starts dating a 21-year-old; Annie is jealous of an old friend who has matured much faster than she has.

name: Family
overview: The lives of the middle-class Lawrence family in Pasadena, California.

episodes.name: Pilot (a.k.a. The Best Years)
episodes.overview: Buddy hears Kate say something about her, and isn't happy. Also, Nancy walks in on Jeff with another woman.

episodes.name: Monday is Forever
episodes.overview: Kate has to wait until Monday to find out whether she has cancer; Buddy and her friend Laura Richardson have until Monday, when the latter's family is scheduled to move to Detroit.

episodes.name: A Special Kind of Loving
episodes.overview: Willie meets, and starts spending lots of time with, Salina -- leading to a tiff with Buddy, right when she needs him to help conquer her fear of diving.

episodes.name: A Right and Proper Goodbye
episodes.overview: Kate's mother comes for one last visit.

episodes.name: Thursday's Child
episodes.overview: As Timmy Jr.'s christening approaches, the whole family (especially Buddy, who stubbornly refuses to take part) relives the painful memories of Timmy Sr.'s death.

episodes.name: Point of Departure
episodes.overview: Doug resents Willie's attitude towards work, the universe, and everything; a string of burglaries sweeps through the neighborhood.

episodes.name: Coming Apart
episodes.overview: Buddy gets a job at a bakery, and introduces Willie to her boss, ""Big Al""; Nancy gets involved with Peter, while she's finalizing her divorce from Jeff -- despite the latter's pleas for a reconciliation.

episodes.name: Such Sweet Sorrow
episodes.overview: Salina drops by, at a time when Willie is having problems with Alex; Doug is offered a great job in New York.

episodes.name: Home Movie
episodes.overview: Willie drives everyone crazy by following them around and filming them; Buddy has difficulty with a school assignment -- writing a speech on the topic of ""How I intend to leave my mark on the world""; Kate runs into a former roommate, who has become a successful author.

episodes.name: Coming of Age
episodes.overview: Buddy officially reaches puberty; Nancy is caught between Kate's resentment of her thoughtlessness, Peter's proposal of marriage, and a come-on from a complete stranger.

episodes.name: Jury Duty (1)
episodes.overview: Kate is subjected to widespread abuse for being the lone holdout; Buddy captures first prize, T.J.'s heart, and (for good measure) the real killer.

episodes.name: Jury Duty (2)
episodes.overview: Kate is subjected to widespread abuse for being the lone holdout; Buddy captures first prize, T.J.'s heart, and (for good measure) the real killer.

episodes.name: The Cradle Will Fall
episodes.overview: Buddy completes her orthodontal treatment; Salina returns to town once again, only to be plunged into a custody battle with her daughter's father; Kate finds out that Elaine's husband is cheating on her.

episodes.name: Skeleton in the Closet
episodes.overview: Doug must face his sister Emily's alcoholism. Buddy tries to help a senior citizen she spots shoplifting food from the supermarket.

episodes.name: On The First Day Of Christmas (a.k.a. The Christmas Story)
episodes.overview: Doug is suspicious when his father introduces his new, and much younger, girlfriend; Nancy and Jeff have a fight over who gets Timmy over Christmas.

episodes.name: Rites of Friendship
episodes.overview: A friend of Willie's comes out of the closet; Buddy, after getting invited to the ""Junior Jump"" by a popular boy, asks Nancy to teach her to dance.

episodes.name: An Eye to the Future
episodes.overview: Buddy (as ""Diamond In the Rough"") gets heavily into the CB scene; Kate decides to go back to college; Doug does a stint as a judge.

episodes.name: Lovers and Strangers
episodes.overview: Willie gets cradle-robbed by a visiting movie director, and takes it much too seriously; Doug gets a dog as a birthday present.

episodes.name: Return Engagement
episodes.overview: Maggie Calder, the woman who nearly destroyed Doug and Kate's marriage 20 years ago, is back for a second attempt. Buddy feels she's being treated like a baby.

episodes.name: Mirror, Mirror on the Wall . . .
episodes.overview: A daughter whom Elaine gave up for adoption years ago finds her, through Kate; Willie is intrigued by a pretty client at the photo studio where he works.

episodes.name: Someone's Watching
episodes.overview: A series of anonymous gifts eventually makes Nancy feel threatened; Buddy's motor-mouth school-project partner uses the Lawrences as his surrogate family.

episodes.name: A Safe House
episodes.overview: A former friend of Willie's, now an outlaw, gives him a call; Buddy thinks she has a great scoop for the school paper.

episodes.name: Best Friends
episodes.overview: Nancy attends her high-school reunion, meeting the guy she dumped to marry Jeff; T.J. asks Buddy to a formal dance, causing a rift with Audrey.

episodes.name: Taking Chances (1)
episodes.overview: When Doug loses his sight after getting hit by a car, opinions are divided as to whether he should undergo an operation that could either restore it, or kill him; in the meantime, Willie has second thoughts about having quit his job.

episodes.name: Taking Chances (2)
episodes.overview: After spending an eternity as a blind man whose youngest daughter despises him, Doug finally musters up the courage to have the operation -- and, of course, all's well.

episodes.name: Comings and Goings
episodes.overview: Willie and Salina search for an apartment together. Jeff's mother Sylvia is confined to the Lawrence home following a back injury and a quarrel with Jeff's father.

episodes.name: . . . More Things in Heaven and Earth
episodes.overview: Kate is shaken by what a supposed psychic says about her long-missing aunt; Nancy lands a prestigious legal assignment, and suspects her looks are the reason.

episodes.name: An Endangered Species
episodes.overview: A recently-divorced friend wants to hang out with Kate; Nancy gets upset when a classmate asks to use her place for an affair with a married man.

episodes.name: Acts of Love (1)
episodes.overview: While Nancy and Buddy prepare for their parents' 25th wedding-anniversary party, Willie meets, and falls in love with, a physics student named Lizzy -- who, as he soon finds out, has radiation sickness.

episodes.name: Acts of Love (2)
episodes.overview: Lizzy dies, but not before Willie convinces her to marry him first.

episodes.name: The First Time
episodes.overview: Kate unhappily contemplates her 49th birthday; T.J. asks Buddy to go steady with him, but she's not sure.

episodes.name: Change of Heart
episodes.overview: Nancy is jealous of Jeff's new fiancÃ©e.

episodes.name: Annie Laurie
episodes.overview: Doug gets propositioned by a female lawyer.

episodes.name: We Love You, Miss Jessup
episodes.overview: Buddy's English teacher gets outed; Willie suspects Nancy of being a home-wrecker.

episodes.name: The Little Brother
episodes.overview: Willie fails to understand a black thing; Buddy develops an interest in genealogy.

episodes.name: Childhood's End
episodes.overview: Buddy's friend Laura returns for a visit, and -- guess what? -- she, too, is now an alkie; a friend of Doug's, a divorced father, is apprehensive about seeing his kids again.

episodes.name: A Tale Out of Season
episodes.overview: Doug's colleague and protÃ©gÃ© turns out to be a child-beater; Nancy finds a puppy; Buddy finally gets into the Thanksgiving spirit.

episodes.name: Labors of Love
episodes.overview: Buddy, upset by a lack of attention from T.J., tries to make him jealous by hanging out with a geek; Willie catches the eye of his cute Ã¼ber-boss.

episodes.name: More Than Friends
episodes.overview: Nancy hits it off with Willie's former writing teacher, but things get awkward when he pans Willie's script.

episodes.name: Princess in the Tower
episodes.overview: Kate, slightly sick of family life, checks out a model apartment in a brand-new high-rise condo -- and gets trapped overnight, along with a very pregnant younger woman; Buddy has the bright idea of dyeing her hair blonde.

episodes.name: Echoes of Love
episodes.overview: Willie can't stop reminiscing about Lizzy, so he hooks up with her former roommate; Audrey is depressed because her parents are splitting up, and angry that Doug is representing her mother in the divorce.

episodes.name: See Saw
episodes.overview: Kate volunteers to help a moody (and arithmetic-obsessed) young patient at the Braille institute; Willie works on installing Timmy's new bed; Buddy leaves for a week-end of skiing with T.J. and his parents.

episodes.name: Lifeline
episodes.overview: Nancy plays hot-line operator when her classmate attempts suicide, to get back at her married boyfriend for breaking up her; Buddy baby-sits a whiny kid.

episodes.name: . . . And Baby Makes Three
episodes.overview: Nancy and Jeff aren't sure whether to get back together; Buddy is disgusted that Audrey has fallen for the cheap ploys of the school Casanova.

episodes.name: Crossing Over
episodes.overview: Willie has an appointment with a big-shot film producer, on the eve of his 21st birthday; then, he and Doug make friends with a stripper.

episodes.name: The Covenant
episodes.overview: Medical crises abound in the family when James reveals to Doug that he must soon undergo exploratory surgery, and Nancy begins to miscarry Jeff's baby.

episodes.name: A Friend of the Family's
episodes.overview: A somewhat unscrupulous former friend of Willie's drops by; Buddy needs driving lessons; Kate and Doug consider taking separate vacations.

episodes.name: Fear of Shadows
episodes.overview: Kate has a recurring nightmare about running over a little boy; Buddy gets a pet raccoon.

episodes.name: Sleeping Gypsy
episodes.overview: Everyone at school dislikes Buddy's bohemian friend; Kate gives Doug a plaid jacket he doesn't much care for.

episodes.name: Counterpoint
episodes.overview: Kate has to go back and repeat a class she flunked the previous semester, and gets picked on by a snobby professor; Doug contemplates early retirement after his tennis partner has a heart attack.

episodes.name: Starting Over
episodes.overview: Annie's sole surviving relative dumps her into the Lawrences' lap -- where she doesn't feel quite comfortable, at first.

episodes.name: All For Love
episodes.overview: Zack tells Buddy that unless she sleeps with him, he will have to satisfy his manly needs with another girl; Doug thinks of buying a flashy sports car.

episodes.name: Changes
episodes.overview: Nancy is all set to re-marry Jeff; Annie, heretofore known as ""Annie Cooper,"" decides to add ""Lawrence"" to her name; Buddy, ever the traditionalist, is bothered by it all.

episodes.name: Magic
episodes.overview: Kate, in the hospital for a physical, meets a burned-out former rock star; Annie needs Doug's help to impress her classmates with magic tricks.

episodes.name: Just Friends
episodes.overview: Willie considers an affair with a married woman he met in a writing class; Nancy, sick of living in a ""fishbowl,"" decides to move out of the guesthouse and into an apartment of her own.

episodes.name: Generations
episodes.overview: The family decides to spend Thanksgiving at Hattie's farm where Kate faces ghosts from the past. Buddy is intrigued by a local boy.

episodes.name: Expectations
episodes.overview: Nancy's new boss pressures her to sleep with him; Buddy tries out for the cheerleading squad.

episodes.name: Gifts
episodes.overview: Annie, who still misses her parents, can't relate to the Lawrences' holiday cheer, and decides to run away until Christmas is over; Willie runs into his old barber, who is about to close up shop for good.

episodes.name: The Friend's Affair
episodes.overview: A colleague and friend of Doug's is cheating on his wife; Annie suspects a next-door neighbor of having murdered his.

episodes.name: Exits and Entrances
episodes.overview: After Buddy stars in a high-school play (Shaw's Saint Joan), her interest in acting is strongly encouraged by a friend of Kate's, a professional actress; Annie gets a telemarketing job to pay for a new bike.

episodes.name: Moment of Truth
episodes.overview: A man he once helped put in jail threatens Doug; Buddy and Audrey have a fight about who copied from whom on an algebra test.

episodes.name: Malicious Mischief
episodes.overview: Nancy considers a marriage proposal from Timmy's daycare provider -- until he gets accused of child abuse; Willie falls in love with a cat.

episodes.name: Sleeping Over
episodes.overview: Buddy's invitation to a sorority becomes a sore point in her friendship with Audrey when Audrey isn't invited to join. Willie sleeps with Kate's musician friend, leading to a serious mother-son rift over casual sex.

episodes.name: Disco Queen
episodes.overview: Buddy sneaks into a disco club, with the help of an older acquaintance, and finds it more than she bargained for; Annie has a date with a jock.

episodes.name: The Athlete
episodes.overview: Buddy, volunteering at a hospital, encounters a star high-school basketball player who is there for a broken leg -- or so he thinks; Annie runs for class president against her nemesis, Emmy Sheldon.

episodes.name: The Competition
episodes.overview: Buddy learns the price of competition when an overachieving classmate commits suicide after losing a history competition to her. Annie's cookie-selling strategy is a riot.

episodes.name: Ballerina
episodes.overview: Willie has a fling with a ballet dancer; Doug purchases a workout set by mail order.

episodes.name: Diversions
episodes.overview: While studying for the bar exam, Nancy's attention is diverted by a charming and seemingly accident-prone neighbor.

episodes.name: An Apple For the Teacher
episodes.overview: Kate's teaching career gets off to a rough start, when a student decides to continuously annoy her; Annie borrows Buddy's ""lucky"" ring to help during a spelling bee, and promptly loses it.

episodes.name: Prelude
episodes.overview: Buddy has a crush on her swimming instructor, much to Zack's displeasure; Kate is tempted to call an old boyfriend.

episodes.name: Going Straight
episodes.overview: Willie hires Bambi Deering, the stripper he met on his 21st birthday. Doug attempts to save hefty plumber's fees by repairing the household pipes himself.

episodes.name: From Russia With Love
episodes.overview: Kate acts as escort to, and highly impresses, a visiting Ukrainian composer; Buddy and Annie play Monopoly to determine who gets Willie's old room.

episodes.name: Thanksgiving
episodes.overview: Doug's father starts showing his age.

episodes.name: 'Tis the Season
episodes.overview: A pre-Christmas argument with Willie nearly gives Doug a heart attack; Buddy invites her school's janitor to her house, where he quickly endears himself to everyone but Kate.

episodes.name: Jack of Hearts
episodes.overview: Buddy and Nancy find themselves in a love triangle; Annie dabbles in the occult.

episodes.name: When the Bough Breaks
episodes.overview: Kate finds out she's pregnant; a friend of Buddy's, on vacation from her all-girls school, picks Willie as a seduction target.

episodes.name: Hard Times
episodes.overview: Two friends of Buddy's who have been going steady for 3 years are having relationship problems -- and when she tries to help, the results aren't quite what she expected; Nancy is having trouble at work, which starts to affect even Timmy.

episodes.name: Whispers
episodes.overview: Buddy's friendship with a teacher gives rise to rumors; Annie uses questionable tactics to get Willie to let her interview him for her school paper.

episodes.name: Play on Love
episodes.overview: Willie finds the director of his play more interesting than Rachel; Buddy insists on buying an old sports car, over Doug's objections.

episodes.name: Daylight Serenade
episodes.overview: Buddy has an ambiguous relationship with a nerdy schoolmate whom Kate is training for a piano recital; Nancy begs Annie to teach her how to roller-skate, so she can go to a party with a handsome fellow lawyer.

episodes.name: Such a Fine Line
episodes.overview: A schoolboy has a crush on Kate; Jeff, now an in-over-his-head rock manager, blows into town with his band.

episodes.name: The Ties That Bind
episodes.overview: Elaine resurfaces in Kate's life after being dumped by Fred for a younger woman. Meanwhile, Annie experiences abandonment issues, too.

episodes.name: Just Like Old Times
episodes.overview: Buddy tries to make everyone think she didn't get into any of the schools she applied to; Doug wants Annie to share his obsession with baseball.

episodes.name: Smarts
episodes.overview: Annie gets picked on by her classmates, for being too smart; Buddy, studying for her SATs, worries that she's not smart enough.

episodes.name: Letting Go
episodes.overview: Doug is upset when Buddy starts dating a 21-year-old; Annie is jealous of an old friend who has matured much faster than she has.
